thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Aisa

author: Aisa
title: Aisa
text: I highly recommend this place to stay! Tata is such a nice person willing to help you in everything you need! Her breakfast was delicious, she took her of us like she was our mom in Cuba. The place is clean and very charming it's also located in center Havana. You won't regret your stay there if I come back to Cuba I'll definitely will stay with Tata again . Thanks again for everything!
